title: Blueprint, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Disappearing Windows", 1934–35
medium: Blueprint and red color pencil on white wove paper
markings: Stamp, lower right: ALLEN AUTOMATIC INC./21 WATER STREET/OSSINING, N.Y.
inscribed: Inscribed at center left: EXTERIOR ELEVATION/DETAIL OF ONE PIECE WINDOW; at lower margin: SECTION; at center right: PARTIAL EXTERIOR ELEVATION/THREEPIECE WINDOW; at lower right: SHEET NO. X1/ALLEN AUTOMATIC, INC./21 WATER STREET/OSSINING, N.Y./SCALE 1/2" = 1'-0" BLDG. LOCATED IN CHICAGO, ILL./ DRAWN BY O.L.A. ARCH. DONALD DESKEY/CHECKED BY CONTR./CONST APPROVED BY JOBNO./ERECTION APPROVED BY DATE/REVISED DETAILS ONE & THREE PIECE/REVISED/ DISSAPPEARING[sic] WINDOWS Inscribed in red pencil at upper margin: FLASHING BY CARON; at lower left: SCHEME #1 [circled]; at lower right: SCHEME #2 [circled] Inscribed on verso: ALLEN AUTOMATIC
description: Elevation and plans for disappearing windows.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Disappearing Windows", 1934–35.
1934–35. Blueprint and red color pencil on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-408.
